name: Publicly Accessible RDS Clusters
query: { dbClusters( where: { cloudProvider: "aws" dbInstances_SOME: { publiclyAccessible: true securityGroups_SOME: { rules_SOME: { direction: "Inbound" OR: [ { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" } { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0" } ] } } } } ) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
